title: MY BROTHERS ACCOUNT WAS DELETED
body: mt brother was playing league yesterday just fine untell today where he couldnt login and i would have made a new account for him but he spent money on the account someone has assuming changed his password or idk i tried to login and stuff tried to get the recovery but he doesnt know the email and he tryied looking for his account online like lolking and stuff but he couldnt find it and he got scaried that his account was deleted or something anyhelp would be great

replies.body: Unless he deleted it then he *probably* got hacked, and the hacker changed his password or deleted his account. And unless you get that email back, I doubt you can get the account back.
there is no way to delete your riot league of legends account. It probably was a name change and or a region change from a hacker.

The account was most likely *compromised* and either the summoner name was changed or it was transferred to another region. We can certainly assist your brother in recovering his account and resolving any other issues with it if he submits a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provides as much information as he can recall about the account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
